content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Mr. Li. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. What is your proposed price for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
250 Euro per month. But I am flexible on the price, please let me know if there is a better deal.

I am also looking for a long term lease, five years or more.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for your proposal, Mr. Li. I appreciate your flexibility on the price. I am open to discussing a longer term lease as well, as it can benefit both of us. However, I would like to clarify a few things before we proceed.

First, do you have any references or previous rental history that I can review to ensure that you will be a responsible and reliable tenant?

Second, I would like to know if there are any additional fees or expenses that I should be aware of, such as maintenance costs or utilities.

Finally, I would like to discuss the terms of the lease, such as the move-in and move-out dates and any penalties for breaking the lease.

Once we have a better understanding of these details, we can continue our negotiations and discuss a final rental price that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have references, I have been renting apartments in China for the past 5 years. I always pay rent on time and take good care of the apartment. I have a good credit score and a stable income. I will sign a long term lease of 5 years or more, and I will pay rent on time every month.

Regarding the additional fees and expenses, I will be responsible for paying for my own utilities, such as electricity, water, and gas. However, I would like to discuss the maintenance costs and any other fees that may be associated with the apartment.

As for the terms of the lease, I am open to discussing a move-in date within the next month, and a move-out date of 5 years from now. I understand that there may be a penalty for breaking the lease, but I am committed to fulfilling the terms of the lease and staying in the apartment for the full 5 years.

In terms of the rental price, I am open to discussing a final price that works for both of us. However, I am looking for the lowest possible price, as I am a student and want to keep my expenses as low as possible.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for providing me with this information, Mr. Li. Based on what you have shared, I am willing to accept your proposed rental price of 250 Euro per month for the 25 square meter apartment.

I appreciate your references and previous rental history, and I am confident that you will be a responsible and reliable tenant. I am also glad to hear that you will be responsible for your own utilities, and I am willing to work with you to discuss any additional fees or expenses associated with the apartment.

Regarding the move-in and move-out dates, I am willing to work with you to find a mutually agreeable date within the next month. I understand that there may be a penalty for breaking the lease, but I am committed to fulfilling the terms of the lease and staying in the apartment for the full 5 years.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a rental price that works for both of us, and I am looking forward to welcoming you as my new tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
